subject: Horse Racing
Breeding of Animals
lead_paragraph: Zippy Chippy has emerged as a lovable ambassador for the humane treatment of horses no longer able to bring in money from racing or breeding to pay their feed and veterinarian bills.
snippet: Zippy Chippy has emerged as a lovable ambassador for the humane treatment of horses no longer able to bring in money from racing or breeding to pay their feed and veterinarian bills.
